      • Use

        public void Use()
        Transforms the value of the field used into true. A ticket that have been used can't be turned to unused.

      • exists

        public boolean exists(Ticket t)
        This is a method a bit similar to the previous one, but with one difference, in the specifiacation of the system is written that a ticket can't exist if it exists another ticket with the same identifiers and the same event.
